analysis.description:
Crowdsale.withdrawManagerBonus (/unique_chucks/26/0x61f30fd17eb78e9d65bac0ad0ac79f6e9aa51594.sol#375-382) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- managerETHaddress.transfer(managerETHbonus) (/unique_chucks/26/0x61f30fd17eb78e9d65bac0ad0ac79f6e9aa51594.sol#377-378)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/26/0x61f30fd17eb78e9d65bac0ad0ac79f6e9aa51594.sol#401-446):
	External calls:
	- token.transfer(msg.sender,tokens) (/unique_chucks/26/0x61f30fd17eb78e9d65bac0ad0ac79f6e9aa51594.sol#429)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- countOfSaleTokens (/unique_chucks/26/0x61f30fd17eb78e9d65bac0ad0ac79f6e9aa51594.sol#430-434)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/26/0x61f30fd17eb78e9d65bac0ad0ac79f6e9aa51594.sol#401-446):
	External calls:
	- token.transfer(msg.sender,tokens) (/unique_chucks/26/0x61f30fd17eb78e9d65bac0ad0ac79f6e9aa51594.sol#429)
	- token.transfer(referer,refererTokens) (/unique_chucks/26/0x61f30fd17eb78e9d65bac0ad0ac79f6e9aa51594.sol#444-446)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- countOfSaleTokens (/unique_chucks/26/0x61f30fd17eb78e9d65bac0ad0ac79f6e9aa51594.sol)

Crowdsale.TransferTokenToIcoContract (/unique_chucks/26/0x61f30fd17eb78e9d65bac0ad0ac79f6e9aa51594.sol#358-365) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(ICOcontract,token.balanceOf(this)) (/unique_chucks/26/0x61f30fd17eb78e9d65bac0ad0ac79f6e9aa51594.sol#360-363)

Crowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/26/0x61f30fd17eb78e9d65bac0ad0ac79f6e9aa51594.sol#401-446) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(msg.sender,tokens) (/unique_chucks/26/0x61f30fd17eb78e9d65bac0ad0ac79f6e9aa51594.sol#429)
	-token.transfer(referer,refererTokens) (/unique_chucks/26/0x61f30fd17eb78e9d65bac0ad0ac79f6e9aa51594.sol#444-446)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/26/0x61f30fd17eb78e9d65bac0ad0ac79f6e9aa51594.sol#401-446):
	External calls:
	- token.transfer(msg.sender,tokens) (/unique_chucks/26/0x61f30fd17eb78e9d65bac0ad0ac79f6e9aa51594.sol#429)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances (/unique_chucks/26/0x61f30fd17eb78e9d65bac0ad0ac79f6e9aa51594.sol#434-435)
	- currentPreICObalance (/unique_chucks/26/0x61f30fd17eb78e9d65bac0ad0ac79f6e9aa51594.sol#430)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/26/0x61f30fd17eb78e9d65bac0ad0ac79f6e9aa51594.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.15 (/unique_chucks/26/0x61f30fd17eb78e9d65bac0ad0ac79f6e9aa51594.sol#7-10): it allows old versions
Parameter '_owner' of BasicToken.balanceOf (/unique_chucks/26/0x61f30fd17eb78e9d65bac0ad0ac79f6e9aa51594.sol#97-98) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_to' of BasicToken.transfer (/unique_chucks/26/0x61f30fd17eb78e9d65bac0ad0ac79f6e9aa51594.sol#80) is not in mixedCase
